title: FS: T206 Horizontals PSA 2 (Birmingham and Murphy)
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Horizontals PSA 2 (Birmingham and Murphy)
posts.post_content:
MHello all,

Looking to sell this pair of horizontals. Take 'em both for $75 delivered (firm). 

I'm also open to equivalent (or other interesting, cash supplemented) trades for W514 strip cards on my [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=150132"]wantlist[/URL]. 
Show me what you got.

First post or PM gets 'em. Paypal preferred. Check or MO ok too.

Thanks,
Chris.
